AssertionError [ERR_ASSERTION]: The input did not match the regular expression /\[401\] \[CB_AU01\] Please login./. Input:

'cli-kintone-linux-x64 record export\n' +
  '\n' +
  'export the records of the specified app\n' +
  '\n' +
  'Options:\n' +
  '      --log-level            The log config level\n' +
  '           [choices: "trace", "debug", "info", "warn", "error", "fatal", "none"]\n' +
  '                                                               [default: "info"]\n' +
  '      --verbose              Set log config level to "debug"           [boolean]\n' +
  '      --version              Show version number                       [boolean]\n' +
  '      --help                 Show help                                 [boolean]\n' +
  '      --base-url             Kintone Base Url\n' +
  '                                 [string] [required] [default: KINTONE_BASE_URL]\n' +
  '      --basic-auth-username  Kintone Basic Auth Username\n' +
  '                                 [string] [default: KINTONE_BASIC_AUTH_USERNAME]\n' +
  '      --basic-auth-password  Kintone Basic Auth Password\n' +
  '                                 [string] [default: KINTONE_BASIC_AUTH_PASSWORD]\n' +
  '      --pfx-file-path        The path to client certificate file        [string]\n' +
  '      --pfx-file-password    The password of client certificate file    [string]\n' +
  '      --proxy                The URL of a proxy server\n' +
  '                                                 [string] [default: HTTPS_PROXY]\n' +
  '  -u, --username             Kintone Username\n' +
  '                                            [string] [default: KINTONE_USERNAME]\n' +
  '  -p, --password             Kintone Password\n' +
  '                                            [string] [default: KINTONE_PASSWORD]\n' +
  "      --api-token            App's API token[array] [default: KINTONE_API_TOKEN]\n" +
  '      --guest-space-id       The ID of guest space\n' +
  '                                      [string] [default: KINTONE_GUEST_SPACE_ID]\n' +
  '      --app                  The ID of the app               [string] [required]\n' +
  '      --attachments-dir      Attachment file directory                  [string]\n' +
  '      --encoding             Character encoding\n' +
  '                                     [choices: "utf8", "sjis"] [default: "utf8"]\n' +
  '  -c, --condition            The query string                           [string]\n' +
  '      --order-by             The sort order as a query                  [string]\n' +
  '      --fields               The fields to be exported in comma-separated\n' +
  '                                                                        [string]\n' +
  '\n' +
  'Either username (--username) or API token (--api-token) is required\n'

AssertionError [ERR_ASSERTION]: The input did not match the regular expression /ERROR: The delete command only supports API token authentication./. Input:

'cli-kintone-linux-x64 record delete\n' +
  '\n' +
  'delete the records of the specified app\n' +
  '\n' +
  'Options:\n' +
  '      --log-level            The log config level\n' +
  '           [choices: "trace", "debug", "info", "warn", "error", "fatal", "none"]\n' +
  '                                                               [default: "info"]\n' +
  '      --verbose              Set log config level to "debug"           [boolean]\n' +
  '      --version              Show version number                       [boolean]\n' +
  '      --help                 Show help                                 [boolean]\n' +
  '      --base-url             Kintone Base Url\n' +
  '                                 [string] [required] [default: KINTONE_BASE_URL]\n' +
  '      --basic-auth-username  Kintone Basic Auth Username\n' +
  '                                 [string] [default: KINTONE_BASIC_AUTH_USERNAME]\n' +
  '      --basic-auth-password  Kintone Basic Auth Password\n' +
  '                                 [string] [default: KINTONE_BASIC_AUTH_PASSWORD]\n' +
  '      --pfx-file-path        The path to client certificate file        [string]\n' +
  '      --pfx-file-password    The password of client certificate file    [string]\n' +
  '      --proxy                The URL of a proxy server\n' +
  '                                                 [string] [default: HTTPS_PROXY]\n' +
  "      --api-token            App's API token[array] [default: KINTONE_API_TOKEN]\n" +
  '      --guest-space-id       The ID of guest space\n' +
  '                                      [string] [default: KINTONE_GUEST_SPACE_ID]\n' +
  '      --app                  The ID of the app               [string] [required]\n' +
  '  -y, --yes                  Force to delete records                   [boolean]\n' +
  '      --file-path            The path to the CSV file                   [string]\n' +
  '      --encoding             Character encoding\n' +
  '                                     [choices: "utf8", "sjis"] [default: "utf8"]\n' +
  '\n' +
  'Unknown arguments: username, password\n'

AssertionError [ERR_ASSERTION]: cli-kintone-linux-x64 record delete

delete the records of the specified app

Options:
      --log-level            The log config level
           [choices: "trace", "debug", "info", "warn", "error", "fatal", "none"]
                                                               [default: "info"]
      --verbose              Set log config level to "debug"           [boolean]
      --version              Show version number                       [boolean]
      --help                 Show help                                 [boolean]
      --base-url             Kintone Base Url
                                 [string] [required] [default: KINTONE_BASE_URL]
      --basic-auth-username  Kintone Basic Auth Username
                                 [string] [default: KINTONE_BASIC_AUTH_USERNAME]
      --basic-auth-password  Kintone Basic Auth Password
                                 [string] [default: KINTONE_BASIC_AUTH_PASSWORD]

      --pfx-file-password    The password of client certificate file    [string]
      --proxy                The URL of a proxy server
                                                 [string] [default: HTTPS_PROXY]
      --api-token            App's API token[array] [default: KINTONE_API_TOKEN]
      --guest-space-id       The ID of guest space
                                      [string] [default: KINTONE_GUEST_SPACE_ID]
      --app                  The ID of the app               [string] [required]
  -y, --yes                  Force to delete records                   [boolean]
      --file-path            The path to the CSV file                   [string]
      --encoding             Character encoding
                                     [choices: "utf8", "sjis"] [default: "utf8"]
